title: 6 Simple Ways to Bookmark a Website on an iPad

steps.title: Open Safari.
steps.content: Open Safari . This app looks like a blue and white compass. Bookmarking websites on an iPad can help you remember and load specific websites without looking through your search history . Be sure to update your iPad .

steps.title: Navigate to the website you want to bookmark.
steps.content: Navigate to the website you want to bookmark. Enter a website's URL in the field at the top, or enter keywords to search for one. Tap go to load the URL or search results.

steps.title: Tap Share at the top-right corner.
steps.content: Tap Share at the top-right corner. A new menu will open. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Add Bookmark.
steps.content: Tap Add Bookmark . This will be below the row of apps, next to an open book icon.

steps.title: Select a save location.
steps.content: Select a save location. By default, bookmarks will be saved into the Favorites folder. This will be the only option underneath Location unless you create a new folder .

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . This will save the bookmark to Safari. Safari will autofill the title field. If you want to change it, tap the title, and then tap the x to delete it. Then, enter a new title.

steps.title: Open Safari.
steps.content: Open Safari. This app looks like a blue and white compass.

steps.title: Tap the sidebar icon in the top-left corner.
steps.content: Tap the sidebar icon in the top-left corner. This looks like a bisected rectangle with lines on the left side. The sidebar will open on the left side of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Bookmarks.
steps.content: Tap Bookmarks . You can find this underneath Private .

steps.title: Tap a folder.
steps.content: Tap a folder. Folders will be listed in the left sidebar. If you don't have any folders, you can find bookmarks in Favorites .

steps.title: Tap the bookmark.
steps.content: Tap the bookmark. All bookmarks will be listed in the left sidebar. Tapping it will load the bookmarked webpage.

steps.title: Open Safari.
steps.content: Open Safari. This app looks like a blue and white compass. Use this method if you want to create folders to separate and organize your bookmarks.

steps.title: Tap the sidebar icon in the top-left corner.
steps.content: Tap the sidebar icon in the top-left corner. This looks like a bisected rectangle with lines on the left side. The sidebar will open on the left side of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Bookmarks.
steps.content: Tap Bookmarks . You can find this underneath Private .

steps.title: Tap Edit.This is at the bottom of the sidebar.
steps.content: Tap Edit .This is at the bottom of the sidebar.

steps.title: Tap New Folder.
steps.content: Tap New Folder . You can find this at the bottom-left corner.

steps.title: Enter a title and tap Done.
steps.content: Enter a title and tap Done . The new folder will be created on the Bookmarks page. You can also create a folder within a folder. Just navigate to the folder, tap Edit , and then tap New Folder to create it.

steps.content: Tap the red circle next to the bookmark. This has a minus (-) symbol inside of it.

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . The bookmark will be deleted.

steps.title: Change the bookmark order (optional).
steps.content: Change the bookmark order (optional). If you want to change the order of your bookmarks, do the following: Tap and hold â˜° next to the bookmark. Drag the bookmark to a new position and release it. Repeat for all other bookmarks. Tap Done .

steps.title: Change the bookmark name (optional).
steps.content: Change the bookmark name (optional). If you want to change the bookmark's name in the list, do the following: Tap the bookmark. Tap the x next to the existing title. Enter a new title. Tap done on the keyboard or Back in the top-left corner.

steps.title: Open Safari.
steps.content: Open Safari. This app looks like a blue and white compass. Use this method if you want to create an app icon on your Home screen for a specific webpage. This will create a shortcut to the website in Safari.

steps.title: Navigate to the website you want to bookmark.

steps.title: Tap Add to Home Screen.
steps.content: Tap Add to Home Screen . This will be towards the bottom of the menu, under Find on Page .

steps.title: Tap Add.
steps.content: Tap Add . The new app icon will be added to your Home screen. When you tap it, the webpage will load in Safari.
